text: Ra yadi tapar'inle uniharusita sodhnuhuncha ki akasabata pani kasale barsayo, ani tyasabata dharatila'i mrtyu pascata jivita kasale garyo,? Ta niscaya nai uniharuko javapha hunecha ki ‘‘allahale!’’ Tapar'im bhannus ki sampurna prasansa allahakai lagi cha. Kintu uniharumadhye adhikatarale bud'dhile kama lidainan
